Text:
"Was there ever a film less likely to benefit from a Blu-ray upgrade than The Blair Witch Project?"
...
"This film looks almost exactly like it did on SD-DVD."

http://www.blu-ray.com/movies/The-Blair-Witch-Project-Blu-ray/13876/
I can't get this ISO to play in VLC nor can I extract the ISO with 7-Zip. Is anyone else having this problem. Has anyone found a solution?

Update: I didn't read the notes carefully, it needs to be extracted with poweriso then you need to navigate to the right folder with vlc and it'll work. On a side note I tried playing the ISO straight from my Patriot PBO Core media player and it just worked straight off the bat. Thanks for the upload!
